name: Aftermath of the Black Monday
description: The Black Monday is upon us... But the state must hold on! As it always did!

name: Žemės reforma
description: \"Žemės reforma\", Land Reforms have been proposed by both the Liberal and Conservative minded individuals within the Seimas, the real question is will the German Junkers be happy with either...

name: Develop the Suduva Region
description: The land reforms have allowed for development within the Suduva region, albeit at a cost.

name: Begin Industrial Expansion
description: We must develop the industries of our nation to better compete with the Westerners to survive this travesty.

name: Foundations for a Better State
description: We have the technology, we have the tools - we can shape Lithuania into a nation better for the common man, without the need of a revolution!

name: Developing the Capital Region
description: The region of Vilnius must be developed through large scale industrial effort and subsidies.

name: Developing the Periphery
description: Samogitia and the lands surrounding it are backwards compared to the Capital - this must change, immediately.

name: Rejuvenating the Arms Industry
description: The nation of Lithuania may be dominated by Germans, but that doesn't mean it can't show it's teeth.

name: Enact Economic Regulation
description: The banks must be controlled to avoid the stock market crash of 1936, and the poorest of the masses must receive subsidies and a minimum wage to live through.

name: Vieskeliai
description: If we put the unemployed through a policy of public works projects, we can increase our country's infrastructure and alleviate the economic downturn at the same time.

name: Provide Relief for Small Business
description: The state must stand up for the little guy, not the monopolists - we must help the small businesses to stay in the market and expand their reach, in all sectors.

name: The Industry Has Recovered
description: After intense reform and work, the Lithuanian economy has been saved from collapse! Lietuva, tevyne musu!

name: Fortify the Capital
description: We must create a set of fortifications around our beloved Vilnius to protect it from even the mightiest invaders.

name: The People's Army
description: Turning service in the Armed Forces into a patriotic and honourable endeavour instead of two years of waste in the draft can heavily increase our morale and unity.

name: Promote the Riflemen Union
description: The Šauliai (Rifles) of Lithuania were founded in 1919 as a civilian self-defence paramilitary organisation, and has grown popular over the years. It is the first step to military service for many young men. We can use it to our benefit.

name: Prepare for Partisan Warfare
description: Lithuania might not survive another war. With that in mind, we must prepare the people of Lithuania for an armed insurrection when the time is due.

name: Begin Army Modernisation
description: Lithuania might not have a lot of men to send to war, but it has a lot of smart minds and innovative people. We can recuperate our disadvantage though a modernised army.

name: Expand City Fortifications
description: We can turn our beloved nation into a fortress, an unconquerable nation, with fortifications that can last for years.

name: Found the LSOF
description: A modern army needs special forces. The newly created Lithuanian Special Operations Forces are ready to fulfil this need.

name: Update Army Equipment
description: We need to focus on building better infantry weapons and artillery to equip our army with.

name: German Military Advisers
description: Germany is our ally - it can provide us with the how and why on everything from weapons to how to use them effectively.

name: Motorisation Effort
description: Let's replace boots to vehicles! It will allow superior mobility and military capabilities compared to what normal infantry can do.

name: Armour Effort
description: What says that Lithuanians can't build a tank? Or plenty of them?

name: Military Industrialism
description: In order to put military innovation to full effect, we must expand our military-industrial complex to fulfil the Army's needs, even if this means with the help of the Germans and their Junkers...

name: Antrasis Departamentas
description: The Antrasis Departamentas "Second Investigation Department" act as the eyes and ears of Lithuania, ensuring she is protected from threats within and without.

name: Establish the Kaunas War School
description: To increase investment in our R&D department and centralised our military knowledge, the Kaunas War School has been established. This has increased capacity in research capabilities and provided a place of learning for the next patch of cadets.

name: Construct the Zokniai Airbase
description: The land near Šiauliai already holds a small aerodrome, but we can expand it and refurbish it into a full-blown airbase for our and our allies needs.

name: Promote the ANBO-IV
description: First designed and tested in 1934, the ANBO-IV remains one of Lithuania's top notch fighter aircraft. If we promote updates and upgrades to this fighter, we can come out on top in fighter design in all of the Reichspakt.

name: Battlefield Support
description: Adopt the Battlefield Support doctrine.

name: Promote the ANBO-VIII
description: While the ANBO-III and ANBO-IV have some light bombing capabilities, the ANBO-VIII is the first aircraft in Lithuanian history designed with bombing and and tactical strikes in mind. By adopting the ANBO-VIII, we well make a leap to an entirely different direction, but it might be necessary...

name: Funkgestützte Flugzeugortung
description: With developlment of Radar technology within Germany and via connections, Lithuania has been able to build it's first radar installation in Kaunas

name: ANBO Superiority
description: Through aircraft infrastructure funding and superior models, we have come out on top as a true nation with wings! May the Order of the Wings of Vytis shine brightly on your suit, Captain!

name: Election of 1938
description: The Seimas election of 1938 may be the most decisive and important in our nation's history. Whichever path we may take, our future will never be the same...

name: Loyalty - Remain Aligned with Germany
description: It would be disastrous if we tried to break away from the Reichspakt. Let's try to stay in the limits of our situation...

name: LSDP - A Caring Nation for Every Man!
description: The Social Democratic Party of Lithuania has chosen it's policy. We can build Socialism without the need of a revolution!

name: Institute Minimum Wage
description: It's so terrifying that the hardest workers in our nation get paid squat for their labour. Half of our nation is near poverty. By limiting the draconic capitalism rampant and instituting minimum wages that allow men and women to make a living, we can drastically improve this situation.

name: The Šiauliai Affair
description: By artificially weakening our police forces in select cities and making the radical nationalists believe that they can coup the nation, we can discover and bust their hideouts and eliminate the risk of a 'Speak Lithuanian' takeover.

name: Reform the Constitution
description: The Lithuanian Constitution of 1920 was written with a German-dominated Lithuania in mind, and is heavily authoritarian, something that will not fly in our nation. We must call up the Seimas and introduce a better democratic model.

name: Crush the Radicals
description: By infiltrating the trade unions in our country and rooting our Syndicalist sympathisers and other radical socialists, we can eliminate the rick of a far-left coup attempt.

name: Negotiate with Trade Unions
description: Destroying trade unions would not fit our ideology! We can negotiate with the Lithuanian Labour Federation, invite them to have a role in government matters and introduce some of their proposed reforms. The conservatives will not be happy, however.

name: The Third Way
description: We will neither be a backwards reactionary democracy nor a revolutionary Syndicalist commune! We have found the path to success, and it doesn't involve either!

name: LKD - Society in God's and the Kaiser's Light
description: The Christian Democratic Party has chosen it's policy. We must retain our loyalty to Germany while promoting the tradition that our forefathers bestowed.

name: Crush the Radicals
description: Both the extreme nationalists and the Syndicalists are dangerous to our society, we must root them out of the government and public view.

name: Invite German Settlers
description: We can expand the industries of our nation by inviting capable workers and engineers from Germany to work on our factories and industries.

name: Revise the Constitution
description: Many people in our nation are bitter about the Constitution of our nation. It doesn't guarantee them the same level of rights as in other nations and is much too autocratic. We can revise it and add additional chapters to appease the people.

name: Adopting a Corporatist Model
description: Adopting a Christian corporatism model, we hope to reform society and rid ourselves of the greed of Capitalism and the sins of Syndicalism

name: Align with Ukraine
description: We like the Ukrainians will when the time is right, charge into the maw of death that is the Russian Army. And with this we shall align our doctrine to that of the Ukrainians.

name: Align with the Duchy
description: Our Baltic brethren to the north have suffered many of the same things that we went through, and like use are ruled by Germans, but in this harsh universe we need to align with the Duchy albeit to guard our little brothers the Latvians and Estonians.

name: LTIP - Nationalism Under the German Boot
description: The Party of Lithuanian National Interests, more commonly known as 'Speak Lithuanian', has chosen it's policy. We can develop Lithuanian nationalism while still aligned with the Kaiser!

name: Promote the Iron Wolves
description: The paramilitary of 'Geležinis vilkas' has been Škirpa's right arm for a very long time, but it is time to legalise them and allow them to run wild.

name: Ban Trade Unions
description: Those pesky workers and their internationalism, they stand in opposition to our government. It's time to take action against these Syndicalist agents and supporters.

name: National Land Reform
description: We can take away land from German settlers and companies and give it to the state and loyal Lithuanian capitalists to use. We can concentrate more and more of our country's economy around the state this way.

name: Authoritarian Constitution
description: What's wrong with a few edits to the country's Constitution? We'll just make sure that it follows our goal of a national Lithuanian state, that's all!

name: Revolt - Declare the Republic!
description: No more German Kings! Nor German settlers! Nor German puppetry! We are free, and we shall always be as such!

name: Desperate Defence
description: The Germans are upon us! We must calibrate our entire nation to endure! And we will endure, damn it!

name: The Nationalisation Act
description: Now that we have freed ourselves from the German grip, it is time for us to get rid of their property. All German wealth, land and factories are ours, nationalise! Kick the Teuton swines out of their country and tell them to never come back!

name: Reorganise the State
description: We must re-calibrate all of the clockwork in the Lithuanian nation and rid it of all German influence. Lietuva lietuviams!

name: Historical Revisionism
description: White Ruthenians? In OUR Grand Duchy of Lithuania? Don't make me laugh! It was always Lithuanian! Always great! Always powerful! Until those pesky Poles and Russians ruined it, that's all! We'll make the people believe.

name: Declare September 8 as National Day
description: September 8, the day when Vytautas the Great was supposed to be crowned King, if not for his untimely death. He was the saviour of Lithuania from Polish dominance, and in these days of German rule, we must look at his persona as an icon of our struggle.

name: Rewrite the Constitution
description: Down with democracy, it's a rotting corpse! We have the power to rewrite the constitution however we please, we will transform Lithuania into what it should have become after the Weltkrieg.

name: Iron Wolf Supremacy
description: The paramilitary of 'Geležinis vilkas' has been Škirpa's right arm for a very long time, but it is time to legalise them and allow them to run wild.

name: Vacation in Varniai
description: We have acquired a lot of political prisoners since we came to power. We need a place to put them in. How about we send them to a vacation in Varniai, to where a seminary used to be...

name: Industrial Effort
description: Lithuania may not be able to become an industrial giant, but it can still modernise and become a modern developed state with a strong industrial sector.

name: Fortress Lithuania
description: With enough fortifications and preparation, no foreign power will ever be able to invade Lithuania again.
